sub_title: People Manager | ATR, PTP & Compliance Expertise | Shared Service | Lean & Project management | Holistic coach l Coaching professional
summary:
Before I had a very well described summary here about me as a finance professional and manager with extensive experience in general ledger accounting, Procure-To-Pay,  asset accounting, VAT regulations, finance & compliance reporting, lean practices and financial accounting. All focusing on my knowledge and not so much on me as a person.

Now I identify myself as a true people manager who can value the personal needs of my staff while managing the companies KPI's and results. And I’m proud to be achieving my results as a manager and have had no unplanned attrition in my teams, just people moving into their next career step that I helped to guide them into.

The wellbeing of my staff is of great value to me, as when my staff is happy they are energized and eager to work and put their best effort in to the day to day job.  And the outcome, the results are there seamlessly. I succeed as manager if my team succeeds in their jobs, and otherwise it is my responsibility as a manager to provide the necessary tools to achieve the desired results. 
I describe myself as being different, caring about mental health at the workplace while applying a strong lean mindset into how I manage the daily workload, projects or tasks assigned to me or my team. 

Being flexible and eager to learn new things makes me almost like a chameleon and I guide my team through these changes while encouraging them also to look better to what they like and dislike and ensure they choose their right career path. Making your own choices and not just go with the flow has so many benefits although it requires a lot of strength to often step into the unknown.

profile_positions.description:
Combining my extensive people management skills with my professional coaching certification resulting in running a coaching practice to support in the areas of Work/Life balance, Stress & Burn-out, Mental health and Self-confidence / Self-love. 
My passion is to ensure everybody is truly living their life to the fullest by being their true strong self. which from personal experience I can relate to is not easy these days. 
With providing readings/seminars on the topics of stress & burn-out, being your authentic self, mental health awareness I want to ensure people have an easy access to tools that can bring major improvements in both their personal as well professional life.
profile_positions.title: Company Owner

profile_positions.description:
As HCP service delivery manager EMEA I’m responsible for the handling of HCP master data, the timely and compliant processing and payment of all HCP invoices for the EMEA region in our GBS organization. In addition my team is responsible for local and European compliance reporting for both direct and indirect spend.
We continuously strive for a smooth and fast payment to physicians using the Ariba & Sap system while keeping an eye on compliance.
We performs many analytical reporting on all spend related tot physicians not only direct spend from invoices but also indirect spend reported in Concur our T&E application.
A key part of my role is to embrace and expand the lean management tools in my team to strive for continuous improvement to be more efficient in our day tot day work to continue to expand our scope of responsibilities.
profile_positions.title: EMEA HCP service delivery manager

profile_positions.description:
As PtP manager within the shared service center of Boston Scientific I’m responsible for invoice  processing, payments  processing, travel & entertainment, and the purchase management of indirect spend for the 14 countries in the EMEA region. 
The team is set uw with a captive team in the NL, a language  center in Poland and a BPO team in India. The full team is around 40 employee’s.
The performance is measured and controlled based on KPI’s, that are reported both weekly as monthly.

We embrace a lean culture and strive towards process improvement and optimization to create room for new activities we can take on or focus on projects. Within Boston Scientific regularly we need to incorporate a newly acquired company into our processes ( for example, American Medical Systems and Symetis)

Compliance and Riskmanagement is part of my day to day job in both the area of Travel & entertainment as in the processing of the invoices to Health Care professionals. We developed reporting and perform insight analytics to ensure we are fully compliant to policies and are able to share details to our business partners.
profile_positions.title: Procure to Pay manager EMEA

profile_positions.description: As projectmanager for a new integration of business in to the Global Business Services department of Boston Scientific, my responsabilities are to manage a smooth transition into the GBS Pilars of Accounting to Reporting, Customer to Cash and Accounts Payable for the European business.
profile_positions.title: Projectmanager GBS integration

profile_positions.description: Job purpose: My responsibilities are managing all daily outgoing payments for all Europeaan countries. These payments are both automated payments from SAP as direct payments entered into the banking system. The payments team exists of 3 persons located in Maastricht and 4 persons located in India. Besides these payments activities we manage vendor open item clearing, regular vendor statement reconciliation and clearing of vendor suspense accounts including monthly reconciliation. During the day to day activites a key focus is continous improvement and we do small and larger projects according to a lean methodoligy using DMAIC initiatives, Prince2 tools etc.
profile_positions.title: Supervisor payment factory

profile_positions.description:
Job purpose:
Ensure the delivery and execution of the Accounting-to-Reporting services of the Financial Shared Services organization as agreed in the Service Description. The employee is the (Single) Point of Contact, the Financial Business Partner within FSS, serving businesses/services operationally and responsible for the financial & tax accounting and reporting.

Responsibilities:
Customer Relationship
• Build bridge between business and back office for transactional activities
• Build bridge between business and accounts payable and receivable
• Understand the customer needs and pro-actively translate these into actions
General ledger, Asset Accounting and Period-end closing
• Month, Quarter and Year closing (commercial and fiscal)
• Timely, complete and correct asset accounting
• Ensure completeness of journal entries, accruals etc.
Financial & Tax reporting
• Monthly and quarterly submission of financial information
Management reporting
• Support on input on forecasts / budgets
• Generate KPI reports
Internal Control
•	 Execute internal controls on Asset Accounting, Journal entries etc.
profile_positions.title: Front office ATR specialist for DSM Fibre Intermediates and DSM Dyneema a.i. via Pragmatics

profile_positions.description:
As a financial interim professional at Pragmatics I’m a highly motivated professional with a lot of experience in the area of finance & control. I’m result driven, committed, proactive and I will not only do my assignment but will also advise how to improve constantly. 

Pragmatics seconded highly educated, experienced financial staff for temporary positions or assignments in the fields of business control, accounting and reporting, governance, risk, project and change management. The key to success is to have people do what they are naturally good at!  Each candidate goes through an extensive personality test and has the essential personal skills which are summarized in the four core values of Pragmatics: Professional, pragmatic, pro-active and personal.
profile_positions.title: Financial Interim Professional

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for the asset accounting of DSM fibre intermediates and DSM Acrylonitrile
• Align asset base / changes with Sitech
• Perform asset  transactions in SAP (creation, put into operation, scrapping etc)
• Responsible for daily hedging of FX exposure
• Responsible for the daily processing of ban kstatements
• Perform authorization step in the payment processing
• Create monthly VAT declaration s (Dutch and Foreign)
profile_positions.title: Accounting & Reporting clerk a.i. via Pragmatics

profile_positions.description:
As a result of a reorganisation the finance department had to move to the plant site in Rozenburg. My task was to ensure a good transition of all the finance activities regarding AR, AP and GL. Next to this assignement I had to ensure that the daily operation activities of my old job continued. 

- Trained the new employee;s
- Wrote procedures and work instructions
- Guided the transition plan
profile_positions.title: Financial accountant a.i. via Pragmatics

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for the handling of all financial transactions or actions related the merger between      DSM and Emerald
• Functional leader of the newly formed financial department of Emerald Kalama Chemical B.V.
• Ensure that all necessary processes and daily activities were performed by the accounts payable and receivable clerk
• Responsible for the daily accounting, the monthly close cycles and all balance sheet and P&L accounts
• Determining the necessary accruals to have a correct cost overview
• Responsible for the completeness of the balance sheet file, VAT and Intrastat declarations
• Responsible for the successful transition of the ERP systems from SAP into Prism/JD Edwards within the period of 6 months
• The scope of this project was transitioning: All Accounts payable and receivable, and Accounting processes; becoming the key user of the new ERP system
• Responsible for the training of the other finance employees and the documentation of the work   processes
profile_positions.title: Financial Accountant

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for all financial transactions concerning the balance sheet and income statement of DSM Special Products
• Monthly closings and Balance Sheets, Suspense Accounts: Financial bookings, Authorizing payments
• Taking care of VAT declarations, Fixed asset accounting, Cost accounting
• Responsible for the processing of all financial transactions to register the sale of DSM Special Products in the financial accounting
profile_positions.title: Single Point of Contact for DSM Special Products a.i. via Yacht

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for the accounts receivable activities of DSM Arbodienst B.V., DSM Special Products, HSC and DPP/Biosolutions
• Responsible for the monthly invoicing and dunning procedure
• Accomplishments:  Improved the outline of the invoices by making necessary textual adjustments, and added a clear annex to the invoices to reduce the number of invoices overdue.
• Processing of Letter of Credits, Order releasing, preparing overdue reports, filling out credit limit applications and performing the monthly closing procedure
• Responsible for the changes in the customer and vendor master data of DSM Special Products
• Draw up procedures for the accounts receivable tasks we performed, and to put all activities in a time schedule to ensure all activities could be performed within time deadlines
• Supervision of accounts receivable colleague's
profile_positions.title: General ledger & Cost Control (via Fagro Consultancy)
